channel.title: About on Corinne Chin | Video Journalist
channel.description: Recent content in About on Corinne Chin | Video Journalist

item.title: About
item.description: Corinne Chin is the director of news talent for recruitment at The Associated Press, working to build and develop a diverse and inclusive global newsroom. She is also a video journalist whose coverage of femicide on the U.S.-Mexico border earned a National Emmy Award in 2021. In her current role, Corinne oversees hiring and recruitment for the AP’s News division, including its Global News Internship program. She is also part of the team running LEAD, an internal leadership program designed to cultivate and empower AP’s future leaders.
